meanings.definition: To grill or cook (food) over an open flame or hot coals.
meanings.sent1: I will charbroil the burgers for our barbecue.
meanings.sent2: Let's charbroil some vegetables for a healthy dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally charbroiled the steak to a crisp!
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to charbroil everything in its scorching path.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of charbroiling meat filled the air, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: Food that has been cooked by grilling over an open flame or hot coals.
meanings.sent1: The delicious charbroil was the highlight of the picnic.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the taste of charbroil over other cooking methods.
meanings.sent3: The charbroil at the restaurant always leaves me wanting more.
meanings.sent4: The charbroil on the menu caught my eye immediately.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of charbroil on the grill was music to my ears.
